movies.title: Hu meng wei long
movies.plot: A group of terrorists murder the captain of a cruise ship and take everyone hostage. Their plan is to steal the uranium being stored in the ship's safe. It's up to a security officer and a pickpocketing cocktail waitress to stop them.
movies.simplePlot: A group of terrorists murder the captain of a cruise ship and take everyone hostage. Their plan is to steal the uranium being stored in the ship's safe. It's up to a security officer and a pickpocketing cocktail waitress to stop them.

biography.bio: Kenny Ho was born on December 29, 1959 in Hong Kong. He is an actor, known for Project A 2 (1987), The Storm Warriors (2009) and Hu meng wei long (1995).
biography.name: Kenny Ho

biography.bio: Christy Chung was born on September 19, 1970 in Montréal, Québec, Canada. She is an actress, known for Samsara (2001), Le médaillon (2003) and The Defender (1994). She was previously married to Jon Yen and Glen Ross.
biography.name: Christy Chung

biography.bio: Elaine Lui is an actress, known for The Bride with White Hair (1993), Hu meng wei long (1995) and Fighting Madam 2 (1988).
biography.name: Elaine Lui

biography.bio: Wing Cho is known for his work on Mr. Nice Guy (1997), Hu meng wei long (1995) and Thunderbolt (1995).
biography.name: Wing Cho

biography.bio: Collin Chou was born on August 11, 1967 in Taiwan as Hsiao-Lung Chou. He is known for his work on Matrix Revolutions (2003), The Matrix Reloaded (2003) and Fearless (2006). He has been married to Wanda Yung since December 10, 1997. They have two children.
biography.name: Collin Chou

biography.bio: Cecilia Ng is an actress, known for Hu meng wei long (1995).
biography.name: Cecilia Ng

biography.bio: Fung Woo was born on January 18, 1932 in Guangzhou, Guangdong, Republic of China as Wu Kai-sau. He is an actor and director, known for Police Story (1985), Les associés (1991) and Overheard 2 (2011). He was previously married to Wing-Ho Lui.
biography.name: Fung Woo

biography.bio: Siu-Tin Lai was born in 1946 in Hong Kong, British Crown Colony as Lai Tin-Ying. He is an actor and composer, known for Police Story (1985), Project A 2 (1987) and What to Do Without Love (1976). He was previously married to Susanna Kwan.
biography.name: Siu-Tin Lai

biography.bio: Mary Hon was born on July 1, 1954 in Hong Kong. She is an actress, known for City War (1988), Bu ze shou duan (1978) and Hu meng wei long (1995). She has been married to Yin-Gor To since 1989.
biography.name: Mary Hon

biography.bio: Suk-Mui Tam is an actress, known for Fist of Legend (1994), Royal Tramp II (1992) and Out of the Dark (1995).
biography.name: Suk-Mui Tam

biography.bio: Cheung-Yan Yuen is known for his work on Kung Fu Hustle (2004), Tai-Chi Master (1993) and Fist of Legend (1994).
biography.name: Cheung-Yan Yuen

biography.bio: Steve Brettingham is known for his work on Piège à Hong Kong (1998), Who Am I? (1998) and Year of the Kingboxer (1991).
biography.name: Steve Brettingham

biography.bio: Habby Heske is an actor, known for The Quest (1996), Mr. Nice Guy (1997) and Hu meng wei long (1995).
biography.name: Habby Heske

biography.bio: After taking up Taekwondo & Hapkido in his native Australia, martial artist/stuntman and action actor Michael Miller found a steady diet of both American and Asian action movies inspired his training and his eventual relocation to Hong Kong in the early 1990s. Miller quickly found work as an actor/stuntman making his debut in Tsui Hark's "Once Upon A Time In China 2", where he played the role of an ill-fated doctor taken out by a burning arrow as well as performing background stunts as a British soldier His other credits include "The Red Wolf", "Robo Kickboxer" for producer Joseph Lai, "The Bodyguard From Beijing", Shannon Lee's "And Now Your Dead", "the Black Sheep Affair" and Tsui Hark's "Knock Off" where he battled Jean Claude Van Damme and performed stunt work in his role as Tickler or the Coughing man One of the few western members of the Hong Kong Stuntman's Association, he returned to Australia in the late 90s.
biography.name: Michael Miller

biography.bio: Robert Samuels is known for his work on Seven Mummies (2006), Blazin' (2001) and Mou mian bei (1995).
biography.name: Robert Samuels
